      "questionbodyhtml" : "<div class=\"question-body\">\n                <p>\n<p>Hi There!</p>\n<p>Looking for options on how I can achieve this - </p>\n<p>Typically Coveo Facet upon selecting a value available fires off a query that checks for an equality on the value selected. Say, I have a Coveo Facet that displays values from 1 to 5. When the end user selects value '4' for example, the results would include only sitecore items that have that field set as '4' for example. </p>\n<p>This is done by the 'aq' being added by Facet that checks for equality. What if I need more than equality like get me all results from sitecore where this field is set to 4 and above. Is this possible? Looking for an elegant way and not by morphing the aq generated by string manipulation. </p> \n<p>\n                </div>",
